posts.post_title: NY Giants Ny recorder team photo premium 1892
posts.post_content:
Not exactly a card but thought it might appeal to 19th century collectors. Some minor losses and tiny tears around edges that could easily be matted out if framed. Great image. If you need better pictures please email me direct
Asking $295 .
Thanks
Matt
